member.name: T:System.Resources.ResourceReader
member.summary: Enumerates the resources in a binary resources (.resources) file by reading sequential resource name/value pairs. Security Note: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk. Call the methods in the class only with trusted data. For more information, see Untrusted Data Security Risks.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified stream.
member.param: The input stream for reading resources.
member.exception: The stream parameter is not readable.
An I/O error has occurred while accessing stream.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceReader.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator for this object.
member.exception: The reader has been closed or disposed, and cannot be accessed.
